1.title: World without Malevolence

episode of.title: Tales of Zestiria the X (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Sorey and the party arrive at Lastonbell, a commercial city in Rolance. There, they see Rose's base of operations.

2.title: Dezel the Wind Seraph

episode of.title: Tales of Zestiria the X (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Sergei visits Sorey again, and the two work out a truce. They start investigating suspicious malevolence-related incidents in Lastonbell together.

3.title: Each Philosophy

episode of.title: Tales of Zestiria the X (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Dezel decides to take matters into his own hands, and begins destroying the city. Sorey, Rose and the Seraphim must stop him.

4.title: Revenge

episode of.title: Tales of Zestiria the X (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Rose decides to part ways with Sorey, due to some urgent business she is not willing to discuss. Mikleo and Edna follow her to investigate.

5.title: Justice at Hand Rather Than Ideal Beyond One's Reach

episode of.title: Tales of Zestiria the X (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Rose finally tracks down her ultimate target, the man responsible for the death of her adopted father. Despite Sorey's efforts to stop her, Rose leaps in for the kill.

6.title: Negotiation

episode of.title: Tales of Zestiria the X (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Sorey meets the emperor of Rolance and enters the city of Pendrago. He must find the cause of the unending rain, but the price for the solution is greater than expected.

7.title: Ladylake

episode of.title: Tales of Zestiria the X (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: The city of Ladylake is again threatened by tornados. It will be days before Sorey can return, so Alisha must do the best she can to minimize the damage.

8.title: Purification

episode of.title: Tales of Zestiria the X (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: Alisha's mentor Maltran is captured, an obvious trap for luring Alisha into Ladylake. Knowing this, Alisha and her soldiers still infiltrate the city.

9.title: The World I Once Dreamed Of

episode of.title: Tales of Zestiria the X (TV Series 2016– )

9.plot: Ladylake is saved, but this is only the first step towards saving the whole world from a larger threat. The party regroups and prepares to face the final and worst foe - the Lord of Calamity.

10.title: The Land to the North

episode of.title: Tales of Zestiria the X (TV Series 2016– )

10.plot: Sorey learns that the Lord of Calamity is in the northern lands, a desolate area imbued with some unknown power. During the travel, Rose and Alisha attempt to learn a new power.

11.title: Become the Wind

episode of.title: Tales of Zestiria the X (TV Series 2016– )

11.plot: With the Lord of Calamity near, Sorey and the party prepare for the final battle. They must find a way to get through the dozens of dragons that have gathered.

12.title: The Answer We Come Upon

episode of.title: Tales of Zestiria the X (TV Series 2016– )

12.plot: Sorey finally reaches the Lord of Calamity. He must find a way to defeat this powerful being, and begins by peering into his past.

13.title: Legend

episode of.title: Tales of Zestiria the X (TV Series 2016– )

13.plot: The Lord of Calamity unleashes his overwhelming power and malevolence. Sorey, Alisha, Rose, and the Seraphim must unite their powers in a way nobody has ever imagined.

0.title: The Age of Chaos

episode of.title: Tales of Zestiria the X (TV Series 2016– )

0.plot: Legends speak of the Shepherd, a savior who will bring peace to the seraphim and human worlds. Sorey has spent his life studying ancient books and exploring ruins to learn more about the legendary savior. When he and his seraphim companion Mikleo encounter a mysterious girl in the ruins, the stories of the Shephard become Sorey's reality. Is he strong enough to take on the evil Lord of Calamity?

1.title: Celestial Capital

episode of.title: Tales of Zestiria the X (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Our princess, Alish, is determined to find the Shepherd, the prophesied hero that will save the land of Glenwood. While inside the mysterious ruins we left her in the previous episodes, she finds a giant mural of the Shepherd and she is attacked by a swarm of insects. She ultimately finds her way inside the ancient temple and tries to find a way to whatever she is destined to find.

2.title: Elysium

episode of.title: Tales of Zestiria the X (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Alisha traveled so far from home just to find and speak to the Seraphim, who she believes hold the key to mankind's salvation. Ironically, she does not have the ability to see or hear the Seraphim, even while being in a town full of them.

3.title: The Sacred Blade Festival

episode of.title: Tales of Zestiria the X (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: After leaving Elysium, Mikelo and Sorey arrive to Lady Lake, where the festival of the Sacred Blade is currently taking place.

4.title: The Shepherd's Destiny

episode of.title: Tales of Zestiria the X (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Our new Shepherd, Sorey, wakes up after being knocked out for three whole days. Being Lailah's vessel so suddenly caused much strain on his body. Upon waking up, he finds out that he's in Alisha's manor, and that Alisha saved him and nursed him back to health.

5.title: The Beginning of the Calamity

episode of.title: Tales of Zestiria the X (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Velvet Crowe swears to kill her sworn enemy, Artorius. When Seres the Malak, ally to Artorius, comes to break Velvet out of prison, Velvet is full of questions.

6.title: Velvet Crowe

episode of.title: Tales of Zestiria the X (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Velvet and Seres face off against Oscar, a powerful Praetor-class Exorcist tasked to stop them. A duel between Velvet and Oscar erupts. Meanwhile, an ominous shadow looms over the island.

7.title: Their Respective Thoughts

episode of.title: Tales of Zestiria the X (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: The tornado threatening Ladylake reveals a dragon inside, but it mysteriously leaves after doing some damage to the city. With the city out of immediate danger, Sorey, Alisha and Mikleo each have different plans.

8.title: Rayfalke Spiritcrest

episode of.title: Tales of Zestiria the X (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: Sorey and Lailah arrive at Rayfalke Spiritcrest, and meet Edna, Zaveid, and a giant dragon. Meanwhile, Mikleo arrives at the ruins and begins to explore.

9.title: City of the Epidemic

episode of.title: Tales of Zestiria the X (TV Series 2016– )

9.plot: A storm has destroyed an important bridge, preventing Alisha and Maltran from reaching their destination. When Sorey arrives at the scene, the team discovers that the storm is not natural.

10.title: Alisha Diphda

episode of.title: Tales of Zestiria the X (TV Series 2016– )

10.plot: With the hellion plaguing the city purified, the city of Marlind takes its first step towards recovery. However, a rider arrives to deliver bad news to Alisha.

11.title: War

episode of.title: Tales of Zestiria the X (TV Series 2016– )

11.plot: Accompanied by Sorey and a new ally, Alisha leads her forces to Glaivend Basin. She must stop the terrible war from starting, or at least end it before the fighting creates irreparable amounts of malevolence.

12.title: The Lord of Calamity

episode of.title: Tales of Zestiria the X (TV Series 2016– )

12.plot: Sorey confronts the Lord of Calamity, the powerful hellion feeding on the malevolence generated by the pain and suffering of war. Sorey, Alisha and Rose must bring a stop to this war, but Alisha is injured by a friendly soldier.

imdb.plot outline: Sorey is a human youth who grew up among the seraphim, spiritual beings not visible to humans. Sorey believes in the folklore that says "long ago, every human was able to see the seraphim" and dreams of unraveling the ancient mystery to make the world a place where people and seraphim can live together in peace. One day, Sorey visits the human capital for the very first time. He becomes embroiled in an incident during which he pulls out a holy sword embedded in a rock and ends up becoming a Shepherd, one who casts away calamity from the world. He begins to realize the gravity of his mission, and his dream of coexistence between mankind and the seraphim becomes more intense and thus, the Shepherd embarks on an amazing journey with his companions.
imdb.title: Tales of Zestiria the X
plot: Sorey is a human youth who grew up among the seraphim, spiritual beings not visible to humans. Sorey believes in the folklore that says "long ago, every human was able to see the seraphim" and dreams of unraveling the ancient mystery to make the world a place where people and seraphim can live together in peace. One day, Sorey visits the human capital for the very first time. He becomes embroiled in an incident during which he pulls out a holy sword embedded in a rock and ends up becoming a Shepherd, one who casts away calamity from the world. He begins to realize the gravity of his mission, and his dream of coexistence between mankind and the seraphim becomes more intense and thus, the Shepherd embarks on an amazing journey with his companions.
